column4: I just did sudo apt-get install libdvdread3 then sudo /usr/share/doc/libdvdread3/install-css.sh =/
I tried this again just now and there's some improvement! Now i get half garbage and half video. But i get a lot of CRC errors and full buffer errors in mplayers debug output
mplayer confused the heck out of me, so I ended up using VLC. Even then, it only worked well if I told it not to use DVD menus and to cache about 3s in advance.
from my experience, DVD playback in Linux is kidna... problematic
